articles.title: Condolatory Message to Cambodian PM
articles.content:
Condolatory Message to Cambodian PM
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Monday sent a condolatory message to Hun Sen, prime minister of Cambodia, on the demise of Great King Norodom Sihanouk.
					 Expressing deep condolences to the prime minister, government and people of Cambodia and the bereaved family members, the message said that Norodom Sihanouk was a prominent state political activist who dedicated his whole life to the country's independence, territorial integrity, national reconciliation, unity and prosperity, and the Korean people's close friend who made distinguished feats in the development of the friendly and cooperative relations between the peoples of the DPRK and Cambodia.
					
					 The great king passed away but his noble feats for the just cause of the Cambodian people will remain long along with their cause for building prospering Cambodia, the message noted.

articles.title: Condolatory Message to Cambodian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Condolatory Message to Cambodian Foreign Minister 
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Monday sent a condolatory message to Hor Nam Hong, deputy prime minister who doubles as minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Cambodia, on the demise of Great King Norodom Sihanouk.
					 The message expressed deep condolences to Hor Nam Hong and the bereaved family members of the deceased, saying that Norodom Sihanouk was an ardent patriot and prominent political activist who made a tangible contribution to the liberation and prosperity of the Khmer nation and the human cause of independence, and a close friend of the Korean people.
					
					 The message noted that the great king passed away but his noble exploits will always be remembered by the two peoples of the DPRK and Cambodia along with the traditional bilateral friendly and cooperative relations provided by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il together with him.

articles.title: Wreaths Sent to Cambodian Embassy
articles.content:
Wreaths Sent to Cambodian Embassy 
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were sent to the Cambodian embassy here Tuesday by DPRK's bodies to mourn the death of Great King of Cambodia Norodom Sihanouk.
					 They were the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly (SPA), the Cabinet, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ministry of Foreign Trade, Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the DPRK-Cambodia Friendship Association.
					
					 The wreaths were placed before a photo of the deceased.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Thae Bok, Vice-Premier Ri Chol Man, Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the DPRK-Cambodia Friendship Association who is chairman of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers, and other officials concerned. 
					
					 They paid silent tribute to the great king and signed a condolence book.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets New Nigerian Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets New Nigerian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with new Nigerian Ambassador to the DPRK Nwofe Alexander who paid a courtesy call on him on Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate to UNGA on Global Economic Situation
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate to UNGA on Global Economic Situation
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegate made a speech at a session of the second committee of the 67th UN General Assembly on Oct. 10.
					 The overall development situation which remains stagnant for the last one year despite the international community's persevering efforts has triggered great concerns, the delegate said.
					
					 He identified issues that should be called to due attention to cope with the present global economic situation.
					
					 He spotlighted the importance of establishing a fair and equal, new international economic system as soon as possible.
					
					 He also underlined the need to boost multilateral economic ties and cooperation for development among member nations on the basis of respecting individual nation's socio-economic systems.
					
					 It is also important to enhance the function and role of the UN in tiding over the present economic crisis.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 A drive is making great headway in the DPRK to build an economic power and improve the standard of people's living under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the party, the state and the army.
					
					 The DPRK government set a goal of turning the country into an economic power based on knowledge in the near future by relying on latest science and technology and is putting forward Korean-style strategy for development and innovative proposals for its implementation. This is in line with the worldwide trend toward the sustained development.
					
					 The DPRK government, which regards it as the supreme principle of the state activities to steadily improve the standard of people's living, will in the future, too, push forward multifaceted exchange and cooperation with all member nations to achieve prosperity and wellbeing common to mankind by establishing the fair international economic relations.

articles.title: Talks between Delegations of WPK and Italian Democratic Party Held
articles.content:
Talks between Delegations of WPK, Italian Democratic Party Held
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Talks between the delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Democratic Party of Italy were held here Tuesday.
					 Present there from the WPK side were members of the delegation headed by Kim Yong Il, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and from the opposite side members of the delegation headed by International Secretary Lapo Pistelli.
					
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of their party activities and exchanged views on developing the relations between the two parties.

articles.title: Italian Party Delegation Feted
articles.content:
Italian Party Delegation Feted
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea arranged a reception in honor of the visiting delegation of the Democratic Party of Italy (DPI) at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel Tuesday.
					 Present there on invitation were the members of the delegation headed by International Secretary Lapo Pistelli and the acting representative of the mission for the development and cooperation of the Italian Foreign Ministry.
					
					 Secretary Kim Yong Il, Vice Department Director Ri Yong Chol and other officials of the WPK Central Committee were present there.
					
					 Kim Yong Il and Lapo Pistelli made speeches at the reception.
					
					 The speakers referred to the significance of the friendly relations between the WPK and the DPI.
					
					 They expressed intention to contribute to more developing the cooperative relations between the two parties and the two peoples.

articles.title: Italian Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Italian Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Democratic Party of Italy headed by International Secretary Lapo Pistelli Tuesday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests looked round the historic relics preserved with much care in the old home, being briefed on the glorious revolutionary history of the President and his family members.
					
					 They also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the E-Library of Kim Il Sung University, etc.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Flies Back Home
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Flies Back Home
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Gunma Prefectural Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity led by Co-representative Tsunoda Giichi flew back home Tuesday.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Meeting with Vietnamese Party Leader Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Meeting with Vietnamese Party Leader Marked
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A film show took place at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Tuesday to mark the fifth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's meeting with General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam Nong Duc Manh.
					 Present there on invitation were Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Le Quang Ba and his embassy officials.
					
					 Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association, members of the association and people in the city attended.
					
					 The participants appreciated the Korean documentary film "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Meets with General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam Nong Duc Manh" on October 16-18, Juche 96 (2007).
					
					 A friendly meeting took place at the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Kyongsang Kindergarten on the same day.
					
					 The participants looked round combined playground, rooms for physical exercise, rhythmic dance and piano training and other rooms for education, being briefed on the warm love shown by the peerlessly great men for the kindergarten.
					
					 They enjoyed an art performance given by kindergarteners.

articles.title: Participants in Celebrations of Anniversary of Revolutionary Schools Tour Various Places
articles.content:
Participants in Celebrations of Anniversary of Revolutionary Schools Tour Various Places
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The participants in the celebrations of the 65th anniversary of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School visited the Revolutionary Museum of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces Monday.
					 They deeply grasped the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, going round various halls which show the great personalities of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and blood ties forged between the leader and his soldiers.
					
					 Visiting the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery, they cherished deep in their minds the revolutionary spirit of the martyrs who laid down their lives in the struggle for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and reunifying the country.
					
					 They also visited the Rungna People's Pleasure Park on Tuesday.
					
					 At the Dolphinarium they went round the well-furnished performance tub and auxiliary tub, place for disseminating scientific and technological knowledge and welfare facilities and watched stunts of dolphins. 
					
					 They spend a pleasant time, riding amusement facilities at the Rungna Fun Fair.

articles.title: Autumn Campaign for Land Management Brisk in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Autumn Campaign for Land Management Brisk in Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The autumn campaign for land management is gaining momentum in Pyongyang.
					 Jo Myong Chol, deputy director of the Pyongyang City Land and Environmental Conservation Bureau, told KCNA: 
					
					 Pyongyang City has planned to plant trees on more than 70 hectares of mountainous area and dig pits for next year's spring tree planting by the end of October.
					
					 In this period of the campaign, the city pressed ahead with forestation nearby railways.
					
					 A parent tree nursery covering 20 hectares has been built in Kangdong County.
					
					 Streets, residential quarters, parks and pleasure grounds are getting covered with land-creeping plants while highways and roads in the city are under repair. Milestones and boundary marks were renewed.
					
					 In another development, river improvement projects are going on in the city.
					
					 On the order of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, servicepersons are now pushing ahead with the dredging project in the Pothong River, in the wake of the completion of such project in the Hapjang River.
					
					 Pyongyang citizens accelerated the construction of a sewage pond and drainage network as part of work to prevent Taedong and Pothong rivers from pollution.
					
					 Industrial establishments updated dust collection facilities and strict measures were taken to preserve cultural relics in a creditable way.
					
					 All Pyongyang citizens have turned out in the drive to give a face-lifting to the city, following Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Fitness Center Completed in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Fitness Center Completed in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The construction of the modern Fitness Center in Thongil Street, Pyongyang was completed.
					 The center is equipped with all kinds of apparatuses for physical exercise and treatment conducive to improving the health.
					
					 It is associated with the love for people of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who makes the people's interests a top priority.
					
					 Kim Jong Un visited the center in September when he stressed the need for it to discharge its mission and role as a public service center and make good management of the service activities.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony took place on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, officials concerned, officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, soldier-builders, officials and employees of the center and Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 Vice-Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Gak, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a speech at the ceremony.
					
					 He underscored the need for officials and workers to make innovations in different fields of building a thriving nation, cherishing the benevolence of Kim Jong Un who spares nothing for improving the people's health and living standard.
					
					 After the ceremony, the participants looked round the center.

articles.title: Non-Ferrous Metal Production Base of March 5 Youth Mine Commissioned
articles.content:
Non-Ferrous Metal Production Base of March 5 Youth Mine Commissioned
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A non-ferrous metal production base was built at the March 5 Youth Mine in the DPRK.
					 The construction of the base equipped with all modern production processes will help make more contributions to developing the country's economy and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 The workers, technicians and officials of the mine built the base in a little more than a year by their own efforts while over-fulfilling their production plan for mineral ores.
					
					 A commissioning ceremony took place on Monday.
					
					 Conveyed there was a message of thanks of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea to the workers, technicians and officials who performed labor feats in the construction of the base.
					
					 The message highly appreciated the workers, technicians and officials of the mine for successfully building the base true to the behest of leader Kim Jong Il by displaying matchless popular heroism and noble self-sacrificing spirit with infinite loyalty to the party.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants went round the base.

articles.title: Mastoncus Institute at Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
articles.content:
Mastoncus Institute at Pyongyang Maternity Hospital 
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Mastoncus Institute went into operation at the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea (October 10).
					 The institute was built on the initiative of leader Kim Jong Il, who cared so much for women's health.
					
					 In his lifetime the leader paid deep attention to curing mastopathy. He saw to it that a department majoring in breast cancer was set up at the maternity hospital, and provided latest medical apparatuses. In November last year, he initiated building the institute at the hospital.
					
					 True to Kim Jong Il's intention, the dear respected Kim Jong Un took an important measure to speed up the construction of the institute and visited the construction site in late June this year, underscoring the need to build the institute on a world level.
					
					 The institute consists of a 4-storeyed main building and auxiliary buildings.
					
					 On the first floor, there are diagnosis and therapy rooms equipped with up-to-date apparatuses, including multi-purpose x-ray apparatus, roentgen CT and ultrasonic diagnosis device.
					
					 On the 2nd and 3rd floors, there are inpatients' rooms with showers and on the 4th floor are operation rooms and intensive treatment rooms.
					
					 The institute is staffed with efficient doctors and researchers.

articles.title: DPRK's Ri Un Sim Wins Adidas Gold Boot at Women's World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK's Ri Un Sim Wins Adidas Gold Boot at Women's World Cup
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Ri Un Sim of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea won Adidas Gold Boot at the 2012 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup.
					 Belonging to the April 25 Sports Team, she was named top scorer with eight goals.
					
					 She made a hat trick in the first group league match and one goal each in matches with France and the United States.
					
					 She scored two goals in the quarterfinals with Canada and one in the finals with France.
					
					 FIFA spoke highly of Ri Un Sim's ability, recalling that she scored nine goals out of 14 the DPRK made at the 2011 Asian U-16 Soccer Championship.
					
					 A Chinese football ace, Sun Wen, said that Ri Un Sim is excellent in technical and physical condition and has a strong mental power. As a young footballer, Ri is very hopeful, Sun added.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK's another female footballer Ri Hyang Sim won Adidas Silver Boot at the world cup.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow 
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on Oct. 12 to mark the 64th anniversary of the establishment of the DPRK-Russia diplomatic ties. 
					 Invited to the reception were Member of the Federation Council of Russia Konstantin Valeriyevich Tsipko, who is vice-chairman of the Committee of Agriculture and Food Policy and Use of Nature of the Council, and officials of the Foreign Ministry, Defense Ministry, Ministry of Economy and Development, Ministry of Finance, Ministry of Extraordinary Situation, Ministry of Transport, Federal Agency of Fisheries, "Russian Railways" Company and the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK. 
					
					 Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and staff members of his embassy in Moscow attended the reception. 
					
					 The participants made bows before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They looked round photos of their undying revolutionary careers and other photos showing the proud course of the DPRK. 
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 Kim Yong Jae said 64 years ago the diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Russia were established to open up the way for comprehensive development of bilateral relations. He referred to the fact that the relations have favorably developed under the care of the leaders of the two countries. 
					
					 He said the DPRK government and people value the development of the DPRK-Russia relations with a long history and tradition, expressing the will to make every effort to boost the friendly and cooperative relations in all fields in line with the spirit of joint documents agreed at the top level. 
					
					 Konstantin Valeriyevich Tsipko said the Russia-DPRK relations based on the principles of equality and mutual respects favor the basic interests of the two peoples, expressing thanks to the friends of the DPRK for sending support to the stand of Russia in the international arena. 
					
					 He said he was pleased to see Russia-DPRK relations of friendship being invariably developed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un in the spirit of the agreement adopted at the top level during the Russian visit by leader Kim Jong Il last year. 
					
					 He wished the Korean people fresh and bigger successes in social and economic development and hoped that they would achieve peace and prosperity of the Korean Peninsula under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Displaying Spirit of Taking Un-trodden Snow-covered Path
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Displaying Spirit of Taking Un-trodden Snow-covered Path
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial calls upon all the officials, working people and other party members to work miracles and perform feats in following the untrodden snow-covered path and leave traces of beautiful life which will remain long in history.
					 The spirit of covering the untrodden snow-covered path represents the spirit in the new historic period for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. It also represents the optimistic and creative spirit of attack to dynamically advance toward the final victory of revolution, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The snow-covered path to be taken by the DPRK is the continuation of the long journey of revolution which Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il made with all efforts and the path of the final victory for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 This spirit is also associated with the boundless loyalty and iron will of the dear respected Kim Jong Un to bring into bloom the seeds sowed by the Generalissimos in the vast land in their lifetime and build a reunified and prospering powerful nation without fail despite any storm and stress.
					
					 This spirit, crystal of the excellent revolutionary spirit which was formed historically and fully displayed, serves as the powerful ideological and moral weapon for winning victory after victory in the great drive for building a thriving socialist nation and reunifying the country by embodying great Kim Jong Il's patriotism. To give full play to the said spirit is a worthwhile work to win a brilliant victory in the general charge to conclude this year's campaign for the present and thus adorn 2012, the starting year of the new Juche centenary, as a year of prosperity.
					
					 A very bright future is opening ahead of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution. It is high time that the fullest play is given to the long-built mental power to bring about a new historic era.
					
					 When all the service personnel and people who grew up to be revolutionaries and patriots under the care of Kim Jong Il valiantly take the snow-covered path following Kim Jong Un, the ideological, moral and physical strength of Songun Korea will be exploded and the thriving socialist nation in which all people will enjoy wealth and happiness under socialism will be built on this land.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Insists on Validity of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Insists on Validity of June 15 Joint Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Koreans do not want to see the deteriorating inter-Korean relations but hope to see a new turn for national reconciliation, unity and reunification being made through the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration solemnly demonstrated at home and abroad the will of the Koreans to solve the issue of the country's reunification independently by their united efforts.
					
					 The declaration identified the strong independent stand that the issue of the country's reunification does not require the interference by foreign forces and the Korean nation will solve it in the spirit of "By our nation itself". Therefore, the declaration has enjoyed full support by all the Koreans. 
					
					 The idea of "By our nation itself" clarified by the June 15 joint declaration has displayed its great vitality, indeed, in deepening the ties of kindred of the nation and realizing multifaceted dialogues, cooperation, reconciliation and unity among broad segments of people, irrespective of differing ideas and social systems existing in the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 The validity and attraction of the June 15 joint declaration are manifested in that it has rallied compatriots from all walks of life in the north, the south and abroad with differing ideology, political view and ism in the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The October 4 declaration serves as the practical programme, action guidelines for comprehensively embodying the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The declaration expounds all the issues in developing the inter-Korean relations and achieving the peace on the Korean Peninsula, prosperity common to the nation and the country's reunification on the basis of reaffirming the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to develop the inter-Korean relations and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country according to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The situation shows that the Korean nation would meet disaster of a war far from improving the inter-Korean relations unless the anti-reunification forces denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and seeking the confrontation with compatriots are eliminated.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lashes Out at Remarks of Chairman of S. Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lashes Out at Remarks of Chairman of S. Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Jong Sung Jo, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of south Korea, made war-like outbursts on Oct. 8. He said south Korea may mount a swift preemptive attack on the north when a sign of its nuclear use is captured. On Oct. 7 he said he was pleased that south Korea has become possible to bring the whole areas of the north within the firing range, talking rubbish that there is flexibility in military counteraction, referring to the new "missile guidance agreement."
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The war remarks made by Jong Sung Jo are a vivid manifestation of zeal for war provocation against the DPRK by the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea which is getting increasingly obvious under the patronage and support of the U.S.
					
					 This has drawn only derision from the public as the regime works hard to do harm to the DPRK though its days are numbered.
					
					 The regime would face more towering resentment and rage of all Koreans and more stern punishment of history as it escalates confrontation with the DPRK to prolong its remaining days.
					
					 The DPRK is being compelled to show its powerful physical muscle to the warmongers who are going reckless to realize the dream of "mounting a preemptive attack" in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 If the puppet forces dare ignite a war against the DPRK, their stronghold will be deluged with bullets and shells of merciless punishment. The army and people of the DPRK will clearly show Korean-style sacred war to the provokers, who are just like newborn puppies which freely wag their tongues without knowing what the real war would be like.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Introduction of AWACS Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Introduction of AWACS Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean authorities introduced one more AWACS, bringing to four the number of the plane deployed in the air force since September last year. The warmongers blustered that the additional deployment will bolster the capacity for detecting all areas of the DPRK. They are now mulling putting AWACS into operation at the end of this year.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a bylined commentary says in this regard:
					
					 This is a revelation of their attempt to drive the situation to the extreme pitch of tension and ignite a war at any cost.
					
					 They are contemplating mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK any time while constantly monitoring it with the use of AWACS.
					
					 They decided to put AWACS into operation a bid to escalate the tension, foster extreme insecurity and thus help the conservative forces stay in power.
					
					 The timeframe set for the operation of AWACS hints that the group of traitors seeks to fake up a shocking case to ignite a war against the north before the expiration of its term. But those fond of playing with fire are bound to perish in it.
					
					 The DPRK has increased the self-defensive capability to cope with the moves of the provocateurs for a war against it and made full preparations to win the final victory in the great war for national reunification.
					
					 The group of traitors will be forced to pay dearly for its reckless actions.

articles.title: Unwarranted Suppression of Pro-reunification Activists Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Unwarranted Suppression of Pro-reunification Activists Denounced in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) and other civic and social organizations in south Korea held a press conference on Oct. 11 to denounce the Supreme Court for its anti-reunification action.
					 The speakers said that the Supreme Court held a trial on an appeal on the same day in which it ruled that the original judgment passed against Chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon Ri Kyu Jae, its former Secretary General Ri Kyong Won and its former Chairperson in charge of information service Choe Un A shall be maintained.
					
					 All reunification movements which had been legally carried out in the past period are being branded as illegal, and legal acts are taken against them under the present regime, they noted, adding this is a vivid manifestation of confrontation policy.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The military authorities are threatening people, terming pro-reunification movement organizations the "organizations following the north". This is little different from violating the freedom of thinking and political rights and cracking down on conscience.
					
					 Koreans in the south, the north and overseas formed Pomminryon and has actively worked to realize the desire of the nation, the speakers said, noting it is absurd to suppress members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon who are working hard for peaceful reunification.
					
					 It is impossible to achieve reunification and democracy without the repeal of the "Security Law", they held, calling for all-out struggle for the abrogation of the SL.

articles.title: "Yusin" Dictatorial Forces' Illegal Fund Management Exposed
articles.content:
"Yusin" Dictatorial Forces' Illegal Fund Management Exposed
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- It was exposed that the Park Chung-Hee dictatorial regime of south Korea illegally held a huge amount of funds.
					 This fact was disclosed as a Korean mediaman in the U.S. on Oct. 7 opened to the press a report on a hearing at U.S. Congress in 1978. 
					
					 According to it, when the U.S. company intended to take over 25 percent of the stocks of the Hungguk Company of south Korea in 1969, Lee Hoo Rak asked for 200 000 U.S. dollars under the pretext of guarding Park Chung-Hee during his tour of the U.S. before signing a contract. After receiving the funds, Lee Hoo Rak deposited them in a foreign bank in the name of So Jong Gwi, and Park Chung--Hee got them back later which he kept in Chongwadae. The Park regime also held a fabulous amount of secret funds in at least three secret accounts in foreign banks.
					
					 After the "yusin" dictator was shot to death, his daughter Park Geun Hye went to a foreign country abroad together with five persons including banking experts and changed the name of the holder of the accounts to be hers. The funds amounted to 6 billion U.S. dollars. This was disclosed by a permanent co-representative of the People's Solidarity against the "Park Chung-Hee Museum".
					
					 Opening to public the report, Korean pressman in the U.S. said that the secret funds case is a product of the dirty illegal dealing by which the Park regime gave great interests to the U.S. company, calling for bringing to light the amount of money deposited in foreign banks.

articles.title: Relocation of U.S. Chemical Battalion under Fire
articles.content:
Relocation of U.S. Chemical Battalion under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea in a commentary on Oct. 12 condemned the moves to relocate a chemical battalion of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces.
					 The U.S. is contemplating bringing back to south Korea the chemical battalion which it withdrew from there in 2004, the commentary said.
					
					 Citing its reason the U.S. says it is aimed to intensify deterrent to threats on the Korean Peninsula but it is nonsensical, the commentary noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. has recently introduced many latest weapons to south Korea and deployed carrier flotillas around the Korean Peninsula. In view of this, the relocation of the chemical battalion cannot but be interpreted as part of the war preparations.
					
					 The U.S. asserted that the chemical battalion will carry out the operation to cope with the threats of chemical, biological and radioactive and high-performance explosion only to leave one suspicious as to whether the U.S. plans even an overall nuclear war.
					
					 Not only the inhabitants in the area to which the chemical battalion is expected to be relocated but all other people are opposed to the moves of the U.S. forces highly likely to bring about the danger of war and incur serious environmental pollution.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Internet Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Internet Website
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The full text of "3. Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully" in President Kim Il Sung's work "Report to the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its Internet homepage on Oct. 8.
					 The part of the work, published on October 10, 1980 clarifies the WPK's struggle for the country's reunification and the tasks for reunifying the country independently and peacefully.
					
					 It sets forth the new reunification proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) on the basis of the three principles of national reunification and the 10-point policy to be enforced by the DFRK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for National Reunification Given Publicity in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for National Reunification Given Publicity in Indonesia
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Indonesian newspaper Suara Karya on Oct. 9 carried an article titled "Kim Il Sung, for reunified Korea" on the occasion of the 32nd anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK).
					 The Korean people's struggle would be unthinkable without the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, for the cause of the country's reunification, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung always put the great national unity above all in realizing the country's reunification, subordinating everything to the unity.
					
					 The three principles of national reunification for independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity, which constitute the core of the historic July 4 joint statement, were also set forth by him.
					
					 The 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation for the reunification of the country laid down by him serves as the great programme of the national unity for the Korean people aspiring after reunification.
					
					 He advanced the proposal for founding DFRK at the 6th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea in October 1980. The proposal calls for founding a federal republic on the condition that the north and the south recognize and tolerate each other's ideas and social systems.
					
					 The monument to his signature at Panmunjom serves as a stark reminder of his undying feats for the cause of Korea's reunification.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked Abroad 
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in South Africa, Britain, Denmark and Mongolia between Oct. 6 and 9. They were to mark the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the 67th anniversary of the WPK and the 86th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Displayed in the venues of the meetings were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party, and Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, praised the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in developing the WPK.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, said that Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the guiding idea of the WPK, is the great revolutionary idea in the era of independence.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, praised Kim Jong Il for greatly contributing to the development of the WPK.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to the dear respected Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings in Britain, Denmark and Mongolia.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Marked in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Russia, Egypt, India and Bangladesh on Oct. 7 and 8 on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed in the venues of the seminars were photos dealing with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for party-building.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works and books and photos introducing the might of the ever-victorious WPK.
					
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, said that the WPK founded by the President is the great party which has won victory only, weathering all sorts of trials in history.
					
					 Chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt Hilmi Ahmad Salim and Chairman of its Committee for External Affairs Yehia Zakaria Khairullah noted that the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for party-building serve as the eternal motive force that dynamically encourages the socialist cause in the DPRK.
					
					 Wipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, said the WPK has its historical roots in the Down-with-Imperialism Union formed by the President.
					
					 The WPK, which is led by its First Secretary Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK who is possessed of the noblest outlook on the people, will always win victory only, enjoying absolute support and trust from the people.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Marked in Russia, Germany, Poland
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Marked in Russia, Germany, Poland
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Organizations and bodies of different countries carried special write-ups between Oct. 4 and 10 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The Young Communist League of Russia carried an article elaborating on the Down-with-Imperialism Union, the historical root of the WPK, under the caption of "October 10 marks the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea" illustrated with a photo of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Moscow Workers' Union of Russia carried an article titled "The great leader of the mother party". It praised the personality of Kim Jong Un as the great man who devotes his all to the interests of the people while believing in them as in Heaven.
					
					 The MS Travel Company of Germany said:
					
					 The Korean people are calling the WPK a mother party.
					
					 Kim Jong Un regards the people as the most precious and powerful one in the world, thinking that leader exists for them.
					
					 To believe in the popular masses and do everything by relying on them is his political philosophy and life motto.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Polish Internet homepage "The DPRK" carried a special write-up on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked in Cambodia, Peru
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked in Cambodia, Peru 
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Cambodian and Peruvian bodies released special issues of bulletin on Oct. 3 and 6 to mark the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the 67th anniversary of the WPK and the 86th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU). 
					 The bulletin of the AKP of Cambodia in an article titled "Founder of the WPK" said that President Kim Il Sung formed the DIU with young revolutionaries of the new generation on October 17, 1926. 
					
					 The undying exploits of the President, founder of the WPK, will shine long with the invincible might of the WPK, organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people, the article added. 
					
					 Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru in its bulletin carried the following article:
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the WPK on October 10, 1945. He led the WPK to victory for a long time.  
					
					 The WPK won victory after victory under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who successfully carried forward the cause of Kim Il Sung. The exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be immortal as they developed the WPK into a party standing in the forefront for independence against imperialism and for defence of socialism.
					
					 The WPK will shine more brightly as the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as it is led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: Anti-Imperialist Stand of DPRK Supported by Organizations of Britain, France
articles.content:
Anti-Imperialist Stand of DPRK Supported by Organizations of Britain, France 
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- British and French organizations expressed support for the statement issued by a spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement on Oct. 9 said the south Korean puppet regime recently announced the "missile guidance agreement". 
					
					 It said that the south Korean authorities asked the U.S. to extend the missile range, an indication that they are dyed-in-the-wool puppets with inveterate sycophancy toward the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. agreement to extend missile range of south Korea for striking any part of the DPRK proved once again its hostile policy towards the DPRK, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. hostility to the DPRK and its aggression intention are being increasingly brought to light. This goes to prove that it was just hypocrisy and deception when the U.S. said that it has no intent to invade the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are the sworn enemy of not only the Korean people but also mankind. 
					
					 We will fully support the revolutionary anti-imperialist stand of the DPRK to fight it out against the U.S. imperialists under the slogan "Annihilate the U.S. imperialist aggressors, sworn enemy of the Korean people!"
					
					 Branding the U.S. imperialists as the world's biggest human rights abuser, plunderer and exploiter, we call upon all the progressives in the world to sharpen vigilance against their arbitrariness and actively work to disclose their nature. 
					
					 The France-DPRK Friendship Association in its statement said it fully supported the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission, expressing the will to continue the vigorous solidarity movement supporting the cause of the Korean people for peace and security in the Korean Peninsula, Asia and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Greatness of Kim Jong Il Praised by Italian Figure
articles.content:
Greatness of Kim Jong Il Praised by Italian Figure 
						
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Miriam Pelegrini Feri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, made public a statement on Oct. 9 to mark the 15th anniversary of the election of leader Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the WPK's 67th birthday. 
					 She said that Kim Jong Il was a renowned state leader, great in ideology, outstanding in leadership ability and experienced in politics.  
					
					 Today the Korean people are working fresh innovations in the socialist economic construction, united close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un in one mind, upholding Kim Jong Il as eternal general secretary of the WPK, she said, adding:
					
					 The imperialists' threats and ever-changing international situation can neither break the single-minded unity of the Korean people united close around Kim Jong Un nor check their advance.

articles.title: Cambodian Great King Passes away
articles.content:
Cambodian Great King Passes away
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Cambodian Great King Norodom Sihanouk passed away.
					 On Oct. 15 State TV Radio of Cambodia published the announcement of the Cambodian government to all people and foreign friends.
					
					 The announcement said Great King Norodom Sihanouk, father of the independence, territorial integrity and national reconciliation of Cambodia, passed away at the age of 90 at a hospital in Beijing early on the morning of Oct. 15.
					
					 The Cambodian government will hold a funeral service at the royal palace according to the manners of Cambodia, it noted.

articles.title: Cambodian Great King Passes away
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un expresa condolencias al rey de Camboya
						
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio la vispera un mensaje de condolencias a Norodom Sihamoni, Rey de Cambodia.
					Su texto sigue:
					
					Informado de la triste noticia del fallecimiento de Su Majestad gran rey Norodom Sihanouk, expreso profundas condolencias a Su Majestad y por su conducto, a los familiares del difunto y al pueblo camboyano.
					
					Su Majestad gran rey Norodom Sihanouk fue padre de la nacion de Cambodia, quien ofrendo toda su vida para defender la independencia y la soberania de Cambodia y lograr la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales, la paz y prosperidad del pais, y destacado politico de talla mundial que acumulo grandas hazanas para el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo del Movimiento de los No Alineados y la causa de independencia de la humanidad.
					
					Tambien ha sido amigo intimo del pueblo coreano.
					
					Los grandes camaradas Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il mantuvieron las mas sublimes y nobles relaciones de obligacion moral, sin precedentes en la historia, y estas sirven de eterna piedra angular de la amistad, la solidaridad y las relaciones de cooperacion entre los pueblos de Corea y Camboya.
					
					Aunque fallecio S. M. gran rey Norodom Sihanouk, sus valiosas hazanas estaran siempre presentes en el alma de los pueblos de nuestros dos paises y de la humanidad progresista.

articles.title: Premier coreano envia mensaje de condolencias a su par de Camboya
articles.content:
Premier coreano envia mensaje de condolencias a su par de Camboya
						
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del fallecimiento de Su Majestad gran rey de Cambodia, Norodom Sihanouk, el premier coreano Choe Yong Rim envio el dia 15 un mensaje de condolencias a su par camboyano Hun Sen.
					En la misiva, el remitente expreso profundo pesar al gobierno y al pueblo del Reino de Cambodia y a los familiares del difunto, senalando que S. M. gran rey Norodom Sihanouk fue renombrado estadista quien dedico toda su vida por la independencia y la integracion territorial del pais y la reconciliacion, la unidad y la prosperidad de la nacion. 
					
					Agrego que el fue amigo intimo del pueblo coreano que realizo meritos excepcionales por el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los pueblos de la RPDC y Cambodia.
					
					Aunque fallecio Su Majestad, sus nobles hazanas realizadas en la justa causa del pueblo camboyano seran eternas en el transcurso de la lucha de su pueblo por construir una Cambodia prospera, concluyo.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun expresa condolencias a su homologo de Cambodia
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun expresa condolencias a su homologo de Cambodia
						
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ACNC) -- El canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun envio el dia 15 al vicepremier y ministro de Relaciones Exteriores y Cooperacion Internacional del Reino de Camboya, Hor Nam Hong, un mensaje de condolencias por el fallecimiento del gran rey camboyano Norodom Sihanouk.
					La misiva expresa profundas condolencias al destinatario y los familiares del difunto destacando que Norodom Sihanouk fue gran patriota, renombrado politico e intimo amigo del pueblo coreano quien hizo gran aporte a la liberacion y prosperidad de la nacion Khmer y a la causa de la independencia de la humanidad. 
					
					Aunque el fallecio, sus nobles proezas quedaran eternamente en el alma de los pueblos de los dos paises junto con las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Camboya, forjadas por los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il junto con Su Majestad gran rey, concluye.

articles.title: Delegado coreano menciona temas para mejorar la situacion economica
articles.content:
Delegado coreano menciona temas para mejorar la situacion economica 
						
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ACNC) -- El delegado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo uso de la palabra en la reunion del 2o comite del 67o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					Pese a los esfuerzos continuos del ultimo ano de la sociedad internacional, no se mejora todavia la situacion general de desarrollo y esto causa seria preocupacion, comenzo el delegado y prosiguio:
					
					Dada la situacion economica mundial de ahora, la reunion de este comite debe prestar debida atencion a los siguientes problemas:
					
					En primer lugar, debe prestar atencion al establecimiento inmediato de un nuevo sistema economico internacional de caracter imparcial y sin discriminacion.
					
					En segundo lugar, a base de respeto al regimen socioeconomico de los paises, debe ampliar e intensificar mas las relaciones economicas multilaterales y la cooperacion de desarrollo entre los paises miembros.
					
					Es importante elevar la funcion y el papel de la ONU para superar la presente crisis economica.
					
					En la RPDC, bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, se libra energicamente ahora la lucha por construir una potencia economica y mejorar la vida del pueblo.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC se propuso la meta de convertir pronto el pais en una potencia economica basada en la intelectualidad apoyandose en las ciencias y tecnicas sofisticadas.
					
					Para alcanzarla, presenta la estrategia de desarrollo y los metodos innovadores al estilo coreano de conformidad con la tendencia mundial al desarrollo sostenible.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC, que toma como maximo principio de las actividades estatales elevar sin cesar la vida del pueblo, establecera en el futuro las imparciales relaciones economicas internacionales para impulsar activamente el intercambio y la cooperacion multilaterales con todos los paises miembros que tratan de lograr la prosperidad comun de la humanidad y fomentar su bienestar.

articles.title: Tienen lugar en Pyongyang conversaciones PTC-PDI
articles.content:
Tienen lugar en Pyongyang conversaciones PTC-PDI
						
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar hoy en esta capital las conversaciones entre las delegaciones del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Partido Democratico de Italia.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los miembros de la delegacion del PTC encabezada por el secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Yong Il, por la parte coreana y por la italiana, los integrantes de la delegacion del PDI, dirigida por el secretario internacional, Lapo Pistelli.
					
					Ambas partes se informaron el estado de actividades de los respectivos partidos e intercambiaron las opiniones para desarrollar las relaciones entre dos organizaciones.
